name: 高繼徽
objective:
本課程透過跨領域的知識講授與設計案例分析，使學生理解設計作為解決問題的理性工具，並認識設計在生活與文明中的角色。課程同時強調思辨與批判能力的培養，建立正確的設計態度與系統性思維。

This course introduces design as a rational tool for problem-solving through interdisciplinary knowledge and case analysis. It explores the role of design in daily life and human civilization while fostering critical thinking and systematic approaches to developing a proper design mindset.
schedule:
第一單元：設計與學習
Unit 1: Design and Learning

  第 1 週：工業設計課程與學習地圖
      Week 1: Industrial Design Curriculum and Learning Map
  第 2 週：作品與作業的標準
      Week 2: Standards for Projects and Assignments
  第 3 週：經典作品與設計邏輯
      Week 3: Classic Works and Design Logic
  第 4 週：學習設計，設計學習
      Week 4: Learning Design and Designing Learning


第二單元：設計與歷史視野
Unit 2: Design and Historical Perspectives

  第 5 週：大歷史與大設計
      Week 5: Big History and Big Design
  第 6 週：世界觀與設計觀
      Week 6: Worldviews and Design Perspectives
  第 7 週：西方六大發明
      Week 7: Six Major Western Inventions
  第 8 週：中國四大發明
      Week 8: Four Great Chinese Inventions
  第 9 週：工業革命 1.0–4.0
      Week 9: Industrial Revolutions 1.0–4.0


第三單元：生物與人類設計
Unit 3: Biology and Human-Centered Design

  第 10 週：生物演化與人類生活
      Week 10: Biological Evolution and Human Life
  第 11 週：比較動物學與人體工學
      Week 11: Comparative Zoology and Ergonomics
  第 12 週：生物複演論與仿生設計
      Week 12: Recapitulation Theory and Biomimicry
  第 13 週：食衣住行育樂設計史
      Week 13: Design History of Daily Life Domains
  第 14 週：專題研討與討論
Week 14: Thematic Discussion and Review


第四單元：設計未來與思辨
Unit 4: Future Design and Critical Thinking

  第 15 週：設計師引導人類演化
      Week 15: Designers Guiding Human Evolution
  第 16 週：未來趨勢預測方法
      Week 16: Methods for Predicting Future Trends
  第 17 週：小組專題發表
      Week 17: Group Project Presentations
  第 18 週：期末總結與回顧
      Week 18: Final Review and Reflection
scorePolicy:
1. 出席與課堂參與
     Attendance and Class Participation
    每次出席佔 2%，缺席或請假不得超過課程總時數的三分之一。
     Each class attendance counts for 2%. Absence (including leave) must not exceed one-third of total course hours.

2. 四次單元筆記與心得報告
     Four Unit Reflections and Notes
    每單元繳交一次書面心得與筆記，佔總成績 10%，共四次。
     Written reflections and notes for each unit, 10% each, totaling 40%.

3. 期末小組報告
     Final Group Project
    小組口頭發表與簡報製作，內容需整合課程學習與設計觀點。
     Oral presentation and slides integrating course knowledge and design perspectives.

4. 教師綜合評量
     Instructor’s Overall Evaluation
    根據課堂表現、態度與整體投入程度調整。
     Adjustment based on overall engagement, attitude, and performance.

Tim Brown《設計思考改變世界》
